title: Bachelor Thesis: Visible Light Positioning System with Dual LEDs
description: Designed and implemented a low-complexity 2D visible light positioning system using dual symmetric LEDs and a photo-diode array. Achieved centimeter-level accuracy with real-time coordinate and rotation estimation.

title: CPU Design Using Vivado
description: Designed and implemented a 32-bit CPU with Verilog. Simulated and deployed on Xilinx FPGA.

title: Optical Positioning Robot
description: Developed an open-source sweeping robot with optical localization system and custom PCB modules.

title: Voice-Controlled Planar Robot
description: Built an ESP32-based mobile robot with voice control and Edge AI, winning national-level IoT awards.
